topic.title: Anonymous Hosting
topic.body: How secure is it to start hosting a site on ZeroNet? What would be the best method to completely anonymise yourself and be a peer on the network?

1_1MtAfPUXCiZYVLjjUjBWmmYGzZ6j3aQYfG.body: Yes but what about backdoors/trojans/BIOS hacks/hardware vulnerabilities
